APPLICATIONS
Complete rules regarding applications may be obtained from:
Dr. Harry J. Skornia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall - Urbana, Illinois
WHEN TO APPLY
Completed applications must be submitted not later than December 31,
1957. These sill be examined by the NAEB Research Committee to
determine those which qualify for the grants.
Winners of grants-in-aid will be announced on or about February 15,
1958.
